item.title: Rooting Samsung Galaxy i9000 with official Froyo
item.description: Upgrading to Android 2.2 (Froyo) on the Samsung Galaxy can be a relatively painless task. Simply followAndroid-2.2-Froyo these steps to get the official update: Connect your Samsung Galaxy phone to your PC Launch Kies In the Kies, taskbar click on the phone icon at the far right to upgrade your phone’s firmware Follow the onscreen instructions Now that you have upgraded to Froyo you’ll want to root your phone.
